name: screenbeard
message: It's been released in Australia, and is available at Atlantic DVD who ships internationally for 19 Aussie dollars plus shipping: It's region 4 however, so be warned. The quality of the transfer isn't great - in fact, someone has accused them of just ripping it from an old VHS copy, which is very probably true. You can see my review of the DVD package in my post Hercules Returns Returns! I hope you can get it. I love it. Thank you for stopping by and leaving a comment!
